blogPost.title: What are the biggest obstacles that are preventing widespread adoption of autonomous vehicles? Answer by Chris Heiser, Co-founder and CEO of @renovo_auto. https://t.co/wBZ0MBHBvL https://t.co/VSCf0BdybN
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 阻碍自动驾驶汽车广泛采用的最大障碍是什么？由@renovo_auto联合创始人兼CEO Chris Heiser回答。https://t.co/wBZ0MBHBvL https://t.co/VSCf0BdybN。
阻礙自動駕駛汽車廣泛採用的最大障礙是什麼？由@renovo_auto聯合創始人兼CEO Chris Heiser回答。https://t.co/wBZ0MBHBvL https://t.co/VSCf0BdybN。
自律走行車の普及を妨げている最大の障害は何ですか？回答者：クリス・ハイザー（@renovo_autoの共同創業者兼CEO） https://t.co/wBZ0MBHBvL https://t.co/VSCf0BdybN

next.title: What are some tips for writing a strong college admissions essay? Answer by Jill Margaret Shulman, author of College Admissions Cracked. https://t.co/EYrQskhh04 https://t.co/cuNfuAsRli

localize.full_text: 写一篇强有力的大学入学论文有什么技巧？由《大学招生破解》的作者吉尔-玛格丽特-舒尔曼回答。https://t.co/EYrQskhh04 https://t.co/cuNfuAsRli。
